docs.snippet: Young men on the front lines of the antigovernment protest said the adulation expressed by many people in Ukraine’s capital has inspired them to keep fighting....
docs.lead_paragraph: Young men on the front lines of the antigovernment protest said the adulation expressed by many people in Ukraine’s capital has inspired them to keep fighting.
docs.abstract: Many residents of Kiev, Ukraine, view antigovernment protesters-turned-street-fighters as heroes; many of the young men say the adulation they receive has served to inspire them to keep fighting.
